nodes.text: A clone medical officer was stationed on a medical Pelta-class frigate during the events of the Clone Wars.

In 22 BBY, a Galactic Republic medical convoy, which included the Pelta-class frigate, was attacked near the Ryndellia system by the Separatist Subjugator-class heavy cruiser, the Malevolence, under command of General Grievous. The ship was badly damaged and it's occupants, this clone medical officer and two clone naval officers, were forced to evacuate using escape pods. The pods were later shot down by the Malevolence.
